verses.text: \add Make haste\add*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w to|strong="H1732"\w* deliver \w me|strong="H2142"\w*; \w Make|strong="H2142"\w* haste \w to|strong="H1732"\w* help \w me|strong="H2142"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*.

Let \w them|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* shame \w and|strong="H3068"\w* confounded \w That|strong="H3068"\w* seek after \w my|strong="H3068"\w* soul: Let \w them|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w turned|strong="H3068"\w* backward \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* dishonor \w That|strong="H3068"\w* delight \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* hurt.

\w Let|strong="H5315"\w* them \w be|strong="H5315"\w* \w turned|strong="H5472"\w* \w back|strong="H5472"\w* \w by|strong="H7451"\w* reason \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w their|strong="H1245"\w* \w shame|strong="H3637"\w* \w That|strong="H5315"\w* say, Aha, aha.

\w Let|strong="H7725"\w* \w all|strong="H5921"\w* \w those|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H7725"\w* seek \w thee|strong="H7725"\w* rejoice \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w be|strong="H7725"\w* glad \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w thee|strong="H7725"\w*; \w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w let|strong="H7725"\w* such \w as|strong="H7725"\w* love \w thy|strong="H7725"\w* salvation \w say|strong="H7725"\w* continually, \w Let|strong="H7725"\w* God \w be|strong="H7725"\w* magnified.

\w But|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H3605"\w* am poor \w and|strong="H8055"\w* needy; \w Make|strong="H1431"\w* haste unto \w me|strong="H1245"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God: Thou art \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w help|strong="H3444"\w* \w and|strong="H8055"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w deliverer|strong="H3444"\w*; \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w make|strong="H1431"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* tarrying.
